UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Goadsporin, a chemical substance which promotes secondary metabolism and morphogenesis in streptomycetes. I. Purification and characterization.
Literature.Author: Onaka H, Tabata H, Igarashi Y, Sato Y, Furumai T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptomyces lividans TK23(MIC=6.4µg/ml),Streptomyces coelicolor A3(2)(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Streptomyces scabiei JCM79(MIC=0.2µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P JC-1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>100µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 21100(MIC=>100µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>100µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 90112(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida glabrata IFO 0622(MIC=>100µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus IFO 8866(MIC=>100µg/ml)
